title: Amistad National Recreation Area: Insects, Spiders, Centipedes, Millipedes
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Insects, Spiders, Centipedes, Millipedes                 Insects and Arachnids         Female Monarch Butterfly   A big attraction for nature lovers at Amistad is the fall Monarch butterfly migration. Year after year, thousands of Monarchs roost in the same few trees as they head to their wintering grounds in Mexico.     Learn more about these butterflies and other invertebrates at Amistad:     Field Guide to Insects Field Guide to Spiders and Scorpions Field Guide to Butterflies, Dragonflies, and Damselflies
